Text: This is disc 1 of an 8-disc set, all covering season 1. As soon as I've seeded this torrent to at least 3.0 ratio, I'll upload disc 2.  I hope to eventually upload all 8 discs.  In the meantime, feel free to leave comments!
Nice upload, i remeber seeing reruns of this as a kid, thanks a lot!
@SomeGuy2005 You're welcome!  My brother and I were fanatical about this show when we were kids.  The episodes bring back so many good memories.
